title: Thank You for the Year! Let’s Work Together for the Next One!
detail_text: <:th_ch0209/>Sending.... complete. How about you, Ayumu-san?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>I’ve just also sent one. I wonder if Aqours members will read it....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Ah.... Rina-chan’s board「Panic」<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>W-, what a fast reply. ....Fufu, it looks like they still have a lot of power left, huh. I’m looking forward to today’s live too!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>I also.... want to do.... a countdown live<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Yeah! I think to be able to greet the end and the beginning of a year with everyone that supports us is the best!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>This year was fun.... But I want to work hard.... to make next year even more fun<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>That’s right, we have to keep moving forward for that, even if it’s in small steps<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Ayumu-san, thank you for the year. I look forward to working with you again next year<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Me too, thank you for the year, Rina-chan. Let’s have more fun times next year!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
